column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛseraa Sara dɛ mbrɛ ɔsee no
column3: na Ɔyɛɛ Sara dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔɔ no anohoba no."
na ɔwoo babanyin maa Abraham wɔ no nkɔdaaber mu
column4: wɔ aber a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no no mu."

column2: "Na Abraham too ne babanyin a Sara woo no maa no no
column3: dzin Isaak."

column2: "Na Abraham ne ba Isaak dzii nda awɔtwe no
column3: otwaa no twatsia
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na aber a wɔwoo ne ba Isaak maa no no
column3: nna Abraham edzi mfe ɔha."
Nyankopɔn ama maserew; hɔn a wɔbɛtse nyinara nye me bɛserew."
Woana na nkyɛ akyerɛ Abraham dɛ
column4: Sara bɛma mba enumfo? Naaso mawo babanyin ama no wɔ no nkɔdaaber mu."

column3: na wotwaa no enumfo: na da a wotwaa Isaak enumfo no

column2: "Na Sara hun Egyptnyi Hagar ne ba a ɔwoo no maa Abraham no
column3: dɛ orisi atwetwe."
Yi afonabaa yi nye ne ba no edzi: na afonabaa yi ne ba nnkɛnye me ba Isaak edzi adze."

column2: "Na asɛm no yɛɛ Abraham yaw papaara
column3: osian ne ba no ntsi."
Mma mma ɔnnyɛ wo yaw
column5: na osian w’afonabaa no ntsi; dza Sara ka kyerɛ wo no nyinara mu
column6: tsie ne ndze; na Isaak mu na wɔbɛfrɛ w’asefo."

column2: "Na afonabaa no ne ba no so mebɛyɛ no ɔman
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ w’asenyi."
na ɔfaa edziban nye nsu bɔdambɔ
column6: na ogyaa ɔno nye abofra no kwan. Na Hagar sii mu

column2: "Na nsu a ɔwɔ bɔdambɔ no mu no no sae
column3: na ɔdze abofra no too ndua no bi ase."
na ɔkɛtsenaa ne tsentsendo wɔ ekyir kakra
column4: bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔtow egyen a obodu: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Mma mma monnhwɛ abofra yi no wu. Na ɔtsenaa ne tsentsendo

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn tsee abofra no ne ndze; na Nyankopɔn no bɔfoe fi sor frɛɛ Hagar
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column5: Hagar? Mma nnsuro; na Nyankopɔn atse abofra no ne ndze wɔ mbrɛ ɔwɔ no."

column3: kɛma abofra no do
column4: na fa wo nsa suo no mu; na mebɛyɛ no ɔman kɛse."

column3: na ohun nsubura bi; na ɔkɔree
column4: na ɔkɛhyɛɛ bɔdambɔ no nsu ma
column5: na ɔmaa abofra no nsu ma ɔnomee."

column3: na onyinii; na ɔtsenaa sar do

column2: "Na ɔtsenaa Paran sar do; na ne na kɔwaar yer wɔ Egypt asaase do brɛɛ no."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ aber no no mu na Abimelek nye ne safohen tsitsir Fikol kasaa kyerɛɛ Abraham dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn dzi w’ekyir wɔ dza eyɛ nyinara mu:"
fa Nyankopɔn dzi nsew kyerɛ me wɔ ha dɛ ennkɛdaadaa emi
column5: nye me mbanana: na dɛ mbrɛ ayamuyie a medze ayɛ wo no tse no ara
column7: nye asaase a aba do ahɔhoyɛ yi."

column3: Mibedzi nsew."
wɔ nsubura a Abimelek no nkowaa dze enyimpi gyee no ntsi."
Minnyim nyia ɔyɛɛ iyi: na wo so annka annkyerɛ me
column4: na nkyii so menntsee pɛn dɛ ndɛ."

column3: nye anantwi
column4: na ɔdze maa Abimelek; na hɔn beenu no dzii ahyɛmu."

column2: "Na Abraham yii nguankuw mu nguambaa aber esuon dze hɔn sii nkyɛn."

column3: Na nguambaa aber esuon a eyi hɔn esi nkyɛn yi ase nye dɛn?"
Nguambaa aber esuon yi na ebɛgye no wɔ me nsamu ama ɔaayɛ dase ama me
column4: dɛ mara na mutuu bura yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔfrɛɛ hɔ Beer-seba; osiandɛ hɔ na hɔn beenu nyina wodzii nsew."
"Na wodzii ahyɛmu wɔ Beer-seba wiei no
column3: Abimelek soɛree
column5: na wɔsanee ba Filistiafo asaase do."

column2: "Na Abraham tsɛɛw ɔsɛntsɛw dua wɔ Beer-seba
column3: na ɔsɔɔr EWURADZE

column2: "Na Abraham yɛɛ hɔho wɔ Filistiafo asaase do nda pii."
